{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year=1993 |Team=Louisville Cardinals |Conference=Independent |Division= |ShortConference= |Record=9-3-0 |ConfRecord=4-0-0 |CoachRank=23 |APRank=24 |HeadCoach=[[Howard Schnellenberger]] |OffCoach= |DefCoach= |OScheme= |DScheme= |Stadium=[[Cardinal Stadium]] |Champion=Liberty Bowl Champions |BowlTourney=[[Liberty Bowl]] |BowlTourneyResult= Win, 18-7, [[Michigan State Spartans football|Michigan State]] }}
The '''1993 Louisville Cardinals football team''' represented the [[University of Louisville]] in the [[1993 NCAA Division I-A football season|1993 college football season]]. The team played their home games in [[Cardinal Stadium]] and were [[Liberty Bowl]] champions.
